response.original_title: I Think He Told Me a Story
response.overview: He told me a story he thought happened. Now he says he doesn't know if it happened. He told me this story from his past and he told me it was always in his mind. And now it is not. Not since he told me this story. He is not sure where it went, but it is no longer in his mind and since it is no longer there he does not know if it was ever there, he says.
response.title: I Think He Told Me a Story
